snippet: The resurrected Dance Theater of Harlem returned to the stage with a bold choice, Balanchine’s “Agon,” and three other works in a mixed program at Jazz at Lincoln Center.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews program of dance pieces, including New York premiere by choreographer John Alleyne, performed by Dance Theater of Harlem at Jazz at Lincoln Center.
lead_paragraph: The resurrected Dance Theater of Harlem returned to the stage with a bold choice, Balanchine’s “Agon,” and three other works in a mixed program at Jazz at Lincoln Center.

headline.seo: Dance Theater of Harlem at the Rose Theater
headline.main: A New Generation Dives In to Learn the Old Language
headline.print_headline: A New Generation Dives In to Learn the Old Language
